summary: As of Jan 2026, no model has reached 94% on Epoch's GPQA Diamond leaderboard. Top is 92.6%. Highest self-reported is 93.8%.
content:
Key findings:
1. Epoch leaderboard top score: 92.6% (Gemini 3 Pro Preview) as of Nov 20, 2025 - and still appears to be the top as of Jan 7, 2026 per lmcouncil.ai
2. Self-reported scores: Gemini 3 Deep Think 93.8%, GPT-5.2 Pro 93.2%, GPT-5.2 Thinking 92.4%
3. None of these self-reported scores reach 94%
4. Epoch hasn't added Gemini 3 Deep Think or GPT-5.2 to leaderboard yet
5. Community prediction dropped from ~40% (Oct) to ~5% (Dec 31) - strong consensus this won't happen
6. Only 4 days remain (closes Jan 27, resolves Feb 1)
7. Epoch self-report analysis shows their scores are close to but not systematically higher than self-reported scores
